doc.title: An Arcadian Elopement
doc.plot: After a man helps his fianc√©e climb out of a window, the two of them are secretly married and head to Nova Scotia for their honeymoon. As they are traveling, the bridegroom gets involved in an altercation at a train station, and later he has a heated dispute with a waiter. As the honeymoon proceeds, things continue to get even less peaceful for the new couple.
